CustomField.formula: CASE(SoWLanguage__c , 'English',"Mutual NDA between "&Account.Name&" EMPAUA", 'German',"Geheimhaltungsvereinbarung zwischen "&Account.Name&" EMPAUA", "Mutual NDA between "&Account.Name&" EMPAUA" )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Field for automatically naming the NDA in Conga / Docusign.
CustomField.label: NDA Name
